name: Time Crystals
description:
Game made for the 2020 Epic MegaJam!

Your civilization in the future was corrupted by some kind of time crystals, you return to the past to save it, it's been a long time, but you're not done yet.

Controls:

  • Left Stick / WASD for moving
  • Right Stick / Keyboard Arrows for aiming
  • Right Trigger / Space Bar for shooting

Meant to play with a controller!
